page.title: 01THE STIRLING AREA
page.content: This block is situated in the upper Forth Valley.The main industry is farming.Running east/west is the A811.The road passes through the small village of Arnprior which consists of a school,a row of council houses,a Post office/shop,some cottages,a smiddy/filling station,a sawmill and a home farm.The village and most of the surrounding farms form part of the ancient estate of Garden which has been husbanded by the Stirling family for centuries.Garden extends to the west.The lands on the south eastern corner of the block formerly belonged to the Gribloch estate which has recently been broken up and sold. Towards the northeast is located a cemetary which also services the two larger villages of Kippen and Buchlyvie,two miles east and west respectively of Arnprior.{
